about_the_game:
Not much time has passed since the events of An Elven Marriage. The demons, led by Zeal and Jul, have begun striking again. This time, however, they're doing it in a different way, using cunning and deception instead of brute force. An apparently harmless attack on the Amazon's Citadel takes Loren out of combat, seriously weakening the chances of the mortal races repelling a demon invasion.

But there is still hope: Jul has been captured and she has information that's crucial to defeating Zeal and the demon army.

Responsibility once again falls on Saren/Elenor who must travel to Zoltar to find an artifact that could give them an edge over the demons. They're joined by old allies and some familiar faces.


- Draco, the clumsy but powerful fire mage (gay love interest)
- Mesphit, the dark elf that can shapeshift into a terrifying monster (bisexual love interest)
- Breza, the Amazon guard captain and epitome of a cold beauty (lesbian love interest)
- Jul, the seductive and cunning succubus who may be their best chance or their worst enemy (bisexual love interest)

And, of course, the loyal and adorable hellhound, Trouble, will be by their side.

Playing as Saren, you can choose to resume your romance with Draco or Mesphit. Elenor may continue a relationship with Mesphit. Alternatively, you can start fresh and pursue a new romance: Saren with Jul and Elenor with either Breza or Jul.

But be careful, as tensions run high among your companions. Breza and Jul despise each other and Jul's loyalty is questionable. Can you trust her?

This game is a sequel to Loren the Amazon Princess and An Elven Marriage, but it can be enjoyed as a standalone. It is the second of four spin-off games featuring characters from Loren alongside some new ones.

content_descriptors.notes:
Depictions of consensual sexual acts. Rare alcohol abuse or self-harm scenes. 

All characters included in the game are over the age of 18.

short_description: In the second spin-off of the VN/RPG Loren The Amazon princess, play as Elenor or Saren again and embark on a quest to Zoltar, where a mysterious relic awaits you. It may be your only hope to stop the demons, who have launched a new attack under Zeal’s leadership.
